name: Blaine Fontana
bio: Sharing art,design,sculpture & murals. I post my risks,creativity,career milestones & experimentation.PDX,OR 🇺🇸/DM Inquires, sales, projects or email:

social_posts.post_text: This was just a blast to do for a friend on their new retainer wall behind their gorgeous new home in the NW Hills, Portland. I’ve been aching to do these groovy stripes for years and finally this client gave me the go. It was also a pleasure working with the landscape designer ( @fusion_landscape_design ) to harmonize both our visions. Completed in the snow, December 2022 8’ x 20’ Aerosol

Just after finishing my huge mural in Sayulita, I trekked out into the San Pancho jungle trail and found this abandoned log. Returned the following day with extra @360spraypaint and did a Andy Goldsworthy nature graff homage for a little magic vibe on trail for hikers. Sayulita has given me so much soul nourishment and inspiration over many years, it was overdue for me to give something back.
 #sayulitalife #blainefontana #thefontanastudios #360spraypaint #sayulitavibes

SOLD. Thrilled to hear this new piece is going to a loving home. This 12x12” acrylic on panel gem was my recent entry into @coreyhelfordgallery “Collectors Show”. It featured numerous artists, new blood and old blood, being exposed to new and seasoned collectors. #coreyhelfordgallery #blainefontana #monarch #monarchbutterfly #thefontanastudios

My deepest appreciation to all those who have served and sacrificed their lives for our freedoms and this great nation. I honor you and your families. 

It was a beautiful and emotional morning visiting my Great Grandparents & Grandparents graves at the Willamette National Cemetery who served and fought in WW1 & WW2. The sea of flags, jet fly overs and Portland Police Pipe Band playing “Amazing Grace” just brought me to tears and thankfulness. Thank you @liz_pdx for supporting me on this day.

My recent entry into the Seattle Art Fair for locally renowned @antlerpdx gallery, a group show featuring over 30 artists on identical panels. These rad hexagon boards were provided in courtesy by @trekell_art_supplies

“Habitat Potential” 14”x12” Acrylic on Panel. 

For sales inquiries, please reach out to: gallerist@antlerpdx.com

#antlergallery #trekellartsupplies #blainefontana #pdxart #hexagonart #antlerpdx #koiart #koifishart

Please see link in bio for “Studio Sale 2023”

We recently completed a massive studio redesign and rebuild. During this process, we uncovered a bunch of wonderful pieces in storage that need to be shared. Over the years we have been accumulating numerous projects/pieces and are running out of room here at the “Treehaüs”. Artwork is literally being stored in the hallway. We would love to see these creations enjoyed by others, rather than collecting dust unable to provide joy for new homes & humans.

Please note certain shipping parameters on individual pieces.  Feel free to DM or email me with questions. Bless up n Live Well…. #blainefontana #pickathon2019 #blainefontanaart #portlandart #thefontanastudios #pickathonart #pickathonartist #nestkeepers #blainefontananestkeepers

Completed and installed early October for the new Multnomah County Library Operations and Fulfillment Center in SE Portland. This 8’x8’ painting on two butted vertical 3/4” appleply was a wonderful creative departure from my usual process and surprisingly one of the most challenging in my recent career. Along with 6 other NW artists who created stunning pieces, we were asked to visually celebrate our natural environment highlighting local fauna & flora. 

Having @portlandstreetalliance running point and collaborating with the awesome architecture group @henneberyeddy_pdx made this all possible.

#blainefontana #psaa #blainefontanaart #portlandart #library #libraryart #portlandlibrary #portlandartist #elkpainting #sacredgeometry

Completed early October for @broadheadagency ‘s recent Portland expansion, this 10’H x 18’W acrylic foyer mural celebrates its new NW office in the heart of the Pearl District. Along with carefully rendered brand guidelines, using esoteric mantras for inspiration and collaboratively introducing some NW funk… we arrived at this explorative creative solution. Creating murals for a creative agency has to be one of the most challenging and yet rewarding experiences. Especially for a National agency of high regard and celebrated awards in numerous industries.

#broadhead #broadheadagnecy #broadheadpdx #blainefontana #portlandart #portlandmural #agencymural #bullart #bull 

Special thanks to my LOML @liz_pdx for putting the puzzle pieces together.

Happy 5th year anniversary/adoption day #tsukilee !!! 

It was almost 6 years ago when I began researching vans for our growing family and our new vehicle needs of continued hunger for outdoor adventures, overlanding, camping and road tripping. Anyone who knows me well would agree I love and live in a world of outrageousness, absurdity, poetry, complexity, creativity and above all…. Unique… my middle age “mid life finest” vehicle would need to be a mirror of this continued path I am so fortunate to be on. 

Fortunately, I found Dan @vanlifenorthwest in North Portland. He made this experience joyful and assuring. At this time in 2017, the 25year legal loophole driving a right side vehicle had just started. As an early adopter and investor it has been incredible to see these vans everyday now, but at first would only see one a month at best. Still today, people smile, gift a Shaka, ask questions and are so genuinely curious. 

This ‘92 4WD Diesel 3L Toyota HiACE SUPER CUSTOM model with 3’ retractable glass moon roof and 2’ driver pop up moon roof, has driven through many states, all of Yellowstone, rescued dozens of stranded souls in the snow, splashed waves and shredded sand on the Oregon Coast like the Fratellis getaway in Goonies, shuttled kids to school, been featured in marketing campaigns…. #tsukilee is revered like a living breathing family member. 

When our van was finally ready, we were in a LYFT early evening in Portland to pick her up. Whilst riding, a massive winter full moon came upon the east horizon, I promptly looked up the translation of “moon” in Japanese… “Tsuki”. Henceforth with a another story, became #tsukilee 

@vanlifenorthwest have been the most kindest, helpful and informative crew I’ve ever experienced owning a vehicle. Investing in these vans folds you into a warm & supportive community, it truly becomes an experience. I’m so appreciative of Papa Van Dan, Jamie and his extended crew looking after my Baby, über dope upgrades and providing countless incredible memories. 

#onelesssprinter #vanlifenorthwest #nwhiacesociety #jdmvan #hiace #toyotahiace #blainefontana #nikitafontana #oregonismagic #vanlife #pnw #lulutohottohandle

Another incredible year creating works that have greatly pushed my abilities, evolved visual boundaries and collaborating with wonderful clients, has made a proud 2023 portfolio. Here’s 10 highlights…. 

Thank you all for your continued support and curiosity into my now 20+ year career. Every morning I wake up and the words fortunate, appreciative and humbled are my first mantras. Looking forward to 2024!
#blainefontana #portlandart #portlandmurals #sayulitalife #functionpdx #broadheadpdx #gbdarchitects #antlergallery #antlergallerypdx #coreyhelford #coreyhelfordgallery #thefontanastudios #artistrepertorytheater #muralhousenpt
